title: Invaders Watch
summary: Invaders Watch - let the invaders tell the time!
description: Invaders Watch - let the invaders tell the time!3 Space Invaders theme interactive watch faces for Android Wear. NEW! The watch face is now interactive! You can shoot the aliens by tapping the screen!★ Invaders• Spaceship will fired at the invaders every minute. • The score is the time! • Tap to fire and show score as date.★ Two extra watch faces: • Invaders shows hour/minute while UFO flies around the screen.• Invaders dance every second while UFO flies by randomly.Watch Face Configuration• Click on the gear icon below the watch face to configure graphics mode.• Show either the new beautiful graphics or retro graphics!* Set 12/24 hour modeSupports both round and square watches.
descriptionHTML:
Invaders Watch - let the invaders tell the time!

3 Space Invaders theme interactive watch faces for Android Wear. NEW! The watch face is now interactive! You can shoot the aliens by tapping the screen!

★ Invaders
• Spaceship will fired at the invaders every minute.
• The score is the time!
• Tap to fire and show score as date.

★ Two extra watch faces:
• Invaders shows hour/minute while UFO flies around the screen.
• Invaders dance every second while UFO flies by randomly.

Watch Face Configuration
• Click on the gear icon below the watch face to configure graphics mode.
• Show either the new beautiful graphics or retro graphics!
* Set 12/24 hour mode

Supports both round and square watches.
comments: Never would install. Just keeps saying download pending...
No date? Pretty sweet, but I wish we could see the date. That's honestly why I bought the paid version. Maybe stick it down where credit is mm/dd?
Nice app.... Great homage to a classic game !!
Retro Heaven Been looking for a space invaders themed watch face and this one's the dogs *******!! Thanks guys.

What Taito should be releasing Seriously, I love the attention to detail you put into this watch face. The only thing I would ask for is maybe have a black and white version and maybe a couple of those barriers as well :) great job dev  Response: yeah white sprites with black background. Maybe barriers that are white or green? :)

Very nice The only request I would make is that there is an option for a plain black background! Otherwise love the style and options.. edited in response to dev question: just aesthetics.. though a monochrome option would be cool too!
